label: cascading_failure_01_ep_022
content:

### Alerts

### Deployments
- Config change: primary pool max_size set to 260

### Events
- Increased primary pool max_size from 200 to 260
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Service-B autoscaling max set from 10 to 14
- Temporary rate limit enabled for /checkout at gateway (per-IP)

### On Call
- On call shift: S. Patel. 16 pages. 6 tickets (POOL-601, SRV-B-275, GW-372, CO-842, RL-33, VEND-102). Status: Mitigating.
